casebody.data:
No. 09-400. Vincent E. Staub, Petitioner v. Proctor Hospital. 562 U.S. 958, 131 S. Ct. 497,

178 L. Ed. 2d 284,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8000. October 12, 2010.

Motion of Equal Employment Advisory Council for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae out of time granted.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
